definition: each sticks to his own opinion (idiom); chacun son gout
each/every
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control

sentences.english: The members couldn't come to an agreement. They were at sixes and sevens.
sentences.chinese: 委员们不能达成一致意见，他们各持己见。

sentences.english: Progress is best made through discussion among people who have contrasting points of view.
sentences.chinese: 提高最好是在人们各持己见的讨论中达成的。

sentences.english: The members couldn't come to an agreement. They were at sixessevens.
sentences.chinese: 委员们不能达成一致意见，他们各持己见。

sentences.english: Most job seekers -- and even career experts -- have strong opinions.
sentences.chinese: 大部分求职者以及职业专家意见都各持己见。

sentences.english: The two sides still differ with each other over the question of pay.
sentences.chinese: 双方在报酬的问题上仍各持己见。

sentences.english: But academic circles hold the personal opinion respectively.
sentences.chinese: 但是学界对其态度却各持己见。
